page.title: 12St. George's Church
page.content: {ST GEORGE'S}was built in 1885 so today is celebrating its centenary.It commemorated its centenary with 7 mystery plays organised by members of the church.There were also parties and services which the Bishop attended.Special mugs and magazines were produced.The present church was rebuilt because the original had problems with an old wooden spire which was falling down one hundred years ago.The Lych Gate still remains from medieval times.It is thirteenth century and is one of the oldest in the country.
